name: 线稿/Anime Lineart
description:
此ckpt魔改的来源是用户大江户战士的线稿lora。最开始魔改的目标是为了让角色lora也轻松能产生线稿(不过目前看来更适合画风lora)

The source of this modified ckpt comes from the user CyberAIchemist's Anime Lineart Lora. The goal of the modification is to allow the character Lora to also generate sketches.The original goal of the modification was to enable the character Lora to easily generate lineart(but currently it seems to be more suitable for the art style of Lora)

使用画师lora和角色lora均能产生线稿关键词和用户大江户战士的线稿lora一样,需要有lineart, monochrome.使用时不要使用有关颜色的提示词，但是请注意，提示词中没有颜色不代表lora本身不会有颜色表现，根据lora本身的各种提示词权重和可能的过拟合状态也可能会出现颜色表现。不过反过来想可以通过写上颜色只让某些地方上色

Both artist's Lora and character Lora can generate lineart, monochrome. The keywords for generating sketches are the same as those used for CyberAIchemist's Anime Lineart Lora, which include "lineart" and "monochrome". Do not use color-related prompt when generating the sketches. However, please note that the absence of color-related prompt does not necessarily mean that Lora itself will not have color expressions. Depending on the weight of various prompt of Lora itself and the possible overfitting state, color expressions may also occur.Thinking the other way around, it is possible to selectively color only certain parts of the sketch by specifying color only in those parts.
